wiki.summary: “Slow It Down” is the second single released for pop singer-songwriter Benson Boone’s debut studio album, Fireworks & Rollerblades. It appears as the third overall track on the record. Some sources have labeled this cut as an “aching, piano-driven number,” and had labeled it as evidence that Boone “had found his niche.” “Slow It Down” was digitally released on March 21, 2024, which came alongside the official announcement of Fireworks & Rollerblades. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “Slow It Down” is the second single released for pop singer-songwriter Benson Boone’s debut studio album, Fireworks & Rollerblades. It appears as the third overall track on the record. Some sources have labeled this cut as an “aching, piano-driven number,” and had labeled it as evidence that Boone “had found his niche.” “Slow It Down” was digitally released on March 21, 2024, which came alongside the official announcement of Fireworks & Rollerblades. Boone first teased it on his social media in a video that was posted on January 8, about two months before the song’s release. During the tracking week ending April 5, 2024, the song debuted at #45 on the Hot 100. The song marks his fourth appearance on the Hot 100, following “GHOST TOWN”, “In the Stars”, and “Beautiful Things”. Read more on Last.fm.
